name: Mr Pumpkin is a cat
description:
Trigger warning: this game is hard! Be mentally prepared before playing.
My submission for The 4 Color Game Jam.

Controls: Use your mouse button for everything

Made in 8 hours, using:

  • Aseprite for the sprites
  • Bosca Ceoil for the music
  • My homebrew game engine
  • My palette of these 4 colors
